title: Deploy Guardian cut release incidents for a multi-service platform
description: A DevOps team replaced manual deployment checks with AI agents that validate rollouts, run smoke tests, and auto-trigger rollback playbooks when regressions appear.
author: Rina Patel

title: Support inbox triage agent resolved repetitive tickets automatically
description: A customer support org introduced an agent workflow to classify intent, draft replies, and escalate only account-risk cases to humans.
author: Noah Kim

title: Analytics team automated anomaly investigation for daily reporting
description: Data analysts used coordinated agents to monitor warehouse freshness, explain metric shifts, and open root-cause investigations with suggested SQL checks.
author: Eli Torres

title: Campaign studio agent stack scaled weekly content output
description: A content team deployed agents for keyword planning, draft generation, and human-in-the-loop QA to publish across blog, social, and docs channels.
author: Maya Singh

title: SOC assistant agent reduced alert fatigue for security operations
description: Security engineers implemented an agent that correlates SIEM alerts, enriches indicators, and recommends incident severity before paging on-call responders.
author: Omar Haddad

title: Procurement automation agents sped up vendor onboarding
description: Operations automated intake forms, compliance checks, and approval routing so vendor onboarding no longer stalls across disconnected tools.
author: Lena Brooks

title: Capacity planner agent optimized infra spend without outages
description: A platform team trained agents on historical load patterns to predict scaling needs and execute safe, pre-validated resource adjustments.
author: Priya Dawson

title: Renewal-risk detection agent prevented high-value churn
description: Support and success teams combined ticket sentiment, account usage, and billing events to trigger proactive outreach before renewals.
author: Kai Romero
